Improvements.Improvement: Extract inner for loop content into a separate method
Improvements.Change_Diff:
- for (JavaAnnotation annotation : annotations) {...}
+ handleAnnotation(constantsMap, apiReqHeader, annotation, javaParameter, method)
Improvements.Description: The method `handle` is quite long, making it hard to understand. Extracting the content of the inner for loop into a separate method will make the code easier to read.
The variable `defaultValue` is initialized with an empty string, which is not necessary because it is immediately updated inside the inner for loop.
